live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38078.summary: Some customers in the Meadowlark Park area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38078.title: June 4 – Edmonton (Meadowlark Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 4:00pm. Please stay tuned for updates.

38025.title: June 3 – Two Mile Corner | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
